metadata.title: Space | Personal Workspace of Yuno
metadata.description: Discover the mysteries of space through immersive experiences, cutting-edge research, and breathtaking imagery.

homePage.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Space v1.0.0 - Initiate your learning warp drive today
homePage.welcomeDescription: Where I learn, code, and grow â€” each star a new concept, each orbit a breakthrough.
homePage.exploreUniverseDescription: Dive into our curated collection of cosmic wonders and scientific discoveries.
homePage.exploreEVIDescription: EVI 2: New voice-to-voice AI for rapid, natural conversations that understands and matches your tone.
homePage.exploreFlashcardsDescription: Conquer vocabulary effectively with smart Flashcards: learn quickly, remember long, improve every day!
homePage.exploreSpeakingDescription: Speak, get detailed feedback, and perfect your pronunciation with our Speaking Practice feature!
homePage.currentMissionsDescription: Follow our ongoing expeditions to unravel the secrets of the cosmos.
homePage.missionWordVoyagerDescription: Your vocabulary universe is expanding! See how many linguistic stars you've collected and how many new galaxies of words await. Keep charting, astronaut!
homePage.missionAsteroidADescription: Long-range sensors are picking up intriguing lexical signals from Asteroid A. Some terms are familiar, others... well, they're definitely 'alien.' Proceed with curiosity and an open mind!
homePage.missionPlanetZ: Planet Z Archives: All Glyphs Deciphered
homePage.missionPlanetZDescription: Mission accomplished! All linguistic artifacts from Planet Z have been successfully collected and archived in the central data core.
homePage.missionUnchartedNebula: Uncharted Nebula {letter}: Awaiting Your First Scan
homePage.missionUnchartedNebulaDescription: This dense nebula, {name}, contains approximately {total_words} undiscovered linguistic phenomena. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to be the first to map its wonders. Are your sensors calibrated?
homePage.contactDescription: Got a brilliant idea, a fascinating thought, or some feedback to share? My inbox is always open for cosmic inspiration!

footer.copyright: Â© {year} Yuno's Space. All rights reserved.

notFoundPage.title: Hmm, looks like you've slipped into another dimension.
notFoundPage.description: This planet doesn't seem to be initialized yet...
notFoundPage.message: But you always have a place to return to ðŸ¤–

learningProgress.title: Course Progress
learningProgress.description: Track the progress of your ongoing courses

taskManager.title: Task Manager
taskManager.description: Track and manage your learning tasks

englishPage.skillsDescription: Track your learning progress in each skill

listeningPracticePage.title: English Listening Practice
listeningPracticePage.exerciseTitle: Exercise {current}/{total} - Listen and answer the question

speakingPracticePage.title: Speaking Practice
speakingPracticePage.description: Press the microphone button and read the vocabulary below.
speakingPracticePage.noWordsDescription: There are no words in this list to practice.
speakingPracticePage.errorNoSpeech: No speech detected. Please try again.
speakingPracticePage.errorAudioCapture: Microphone not found. Please check your device.
speakingPracticePage.errorNotAllowed: Microphone access denied. Please grant permission.
speakingPracticePage.errorRecognitionState: Recognition state error, please try again shortly.
speakingPracticePage.feedbackExcellent: Excellent! Your pronunciation is very accurate.
speakingPracticePage.feedbackVeryGood: Very good! Your pronunciation is quite accurate.
speakingPracticePage.feedbackGood: Good! Your pronunciation is mostly correct.
speakingPracticePage.feedbackNeedsImprovement: Needs improvement. Listen and try again.
speakingPracticePage.feedbackTryAgain: Listen to the correct pronunciation and try again.
speakingPracticePage.markMasteredTooltip: Score 85 or above to mark as mastered
speakingPracticePage.markMasteredDisabledTooltip: Mark this word as proficiently pronounced

vocabularyPracticePage.title: Vocabulary Card
vocabularyPracticePage.description: Click the card to see the definition
vocabularyPracticePage.noCards: No vocabulary cards available for practice at the moment.

blogPage.title: Blog
blogPage.errorLoading: Failed to load posts. Please try again later.

coursesPage.loadingError: An error occurred while loading the course list.
coursesPage.noCoursesForPage: No courses found for this page.
coursesPage.noCoursesYet: There are no courses available yet.

missionsPage.title: Space Missions
missionsPage.description: Explore our ongoing and upcoming space missions. From deep space exploration to orbital research, our missions push the boundaries of human knowledge and technological capabilities.

emptyState.defaultDescription: It seems no data has been created or found.
emptyState.searchDescription: Try changing your search keywords or filters.
emptyState.contentDescription: Let's start by creating new content.

userDropdown.newResearchDesc: "Quantum Entanglement in Deep Space" has been published
userDropdown.systemAlertDesc: Scheduled maintenance will occur on April 15th at 02:00 UTC
